name: CORECRUST
description:
( Please note that CORECURST is currently unfinished and wont be for awhile, im asking people to download the game and report any bugs they can find to me, nothing major has been added to the game so dont expect much, this is  just for testing and to report bugs. )

( Discord: ZRKO#7391 )

( Discord server: https://discord.gg/EJMAgy3 )

Controls: 

- Left and right arrow keys for movement

- X for jumping

- C for shooting

- S for zooming in

- Z for entering doors

- R to restart the scene

- V for melee weapon 

Alright thanks.
